item.description: In this movie and discussion, we will watch a documentary with Wayne Dyer as he helps us understand when we hit a certain part of life, we begin to understand we want more. He will share with us what that change looks like and how it is different for men than it is for women. We will talk about the changes we go through in life in general, how our priorities change, and how in the secondÂ  half of life our callings become stronger and stronger, until we understand the meaning to ambition. $15 per person.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: PTL ~ Movie & Discussion:
